<!--Setup 33-function-scoping.R -->
```{r setup-33-function-scoping-r}
a <- 5
```


<!--A function can access global variables: -->
```{r a-function-can-access-global-variables}
f <- function() {
  a
}

f()
```


<!--When a function writes to a variable, it always writes in scope -->
```{r when-a-function-writes-to-a-variable-it-always-writes-in-scope}
f <- function() {
  a <- 2
  a
}

f()
a
```
